item.title: Adding new zones[PI]
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

[quote=“blo0d pker, post:1, topic:399542”]For awhile I’ve been curious as to how to add a new zone, such as a pk/multi/safe zone. I know it would be something along the lines of this:

public boolean inWild() { if(isInFala() || isInArd() || isInFunPk() || isInPvP()) { return true; } if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3966 || absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10366){ return true; } return false; } my question being, is this:absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3966 : supposed to form a square?or what shape?
If so, how is it supposed to form?When I try to form it, the area I try stays the same…[/quote]

Basically what it says…; Xcoord (I’d put this in the very south west corner) > 2941 && Xcoord (I’d put this in north east corner) < 3392 && Ycoord > 3518 (the y coord of the very south west corner) && Ycoord (I’d put this in north east corner) < 3966

Hope that got the point across, it’s really easy when you get the hang of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding new zones[PI]
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

For awhile I’ve been curious as to how to add a new zone, such as a pk/multi/safe zone. I know it would be something along the lines of this:

public boolean inWild() { if(isInFala() || isInArd() || isInFunPk() || isInPvP()) { return true; } if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3966 || absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10366){ return true; } return false; } my question being, is this:absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3966 : supposed to form a square?or what shape?
If so, how is it supposed to form?When I try to form it, the area I try stays the same…
